story_parts.text: The lion was so excited to go to Disney World! He had always wanted to go and finally he was going to make his dream come true. He packed his bags and hopped on the plane. When he arrived, he was amazed at all the sights and sounds. He went on all the rides and met all the characters. It was the best trip ever!

next_options.0: The lion went home and told all his friends about his amazing trip
next_options.1: The lion decided to stay at Disney World and live there forever

story_parts.text: The lion went home and told all his friends about his amazing trip. He said that he had the best time ever and that he would definitely go back. His friends were so jealous and wished they could go too.

next_options.0: The lion's friends decide to go on their own amazing trip
next_options.1: The lion's friends decide to stay home and never leave again
